title: News Briefs 01-02-2021
cleaned_text:
• ‘Oumuamua proves that science doesn’t want to find aliens.
• Related: ‘Seeing the spaceship’ – why we need to pay attention to anomalies.
• Centuries-old ‘Long Man of Wilmington’ carving vandalised with the addition of a face mask.
• A new documentary chronicles the attempts of Bill Drummond and Jimmy Cauty, aka The Justified Ancients Of Mu Mu, aka The KLF, to build an enormous ‘pyramid of the dead’ in Liverpool.
• The real-life ghost story so gripping even sceptics are drawn in.
• Canadian woman wins $60 million jackpot after betting on numbers from husband’s dream.
• New study links our built-in sleep patterns to phases of the moon.
• Why do our minds wander? Brain study shows the benefits of day-dreaming.
• Ultrasound blasts ‘jumpstarted’ the brains of two people in coma-like state.
• The QAnon timeline: Four years, 5000 drops, and countless failed prophecies.
• Wisconsin pharmacist who intentionally sabotaged hundreds of doses of COVID vaccine is a Flat-Earther, FBI document reveals.

Thanks to Bill D., PaddyMac, Christopher M., Nick G., Artofmulata, Sam C., Michael R., Frank I., Jeff S., Mark B., Paul O, Andy R., Mark C., Lee B., Fran W., Marshal E., Bill R., Debra H., Peter M., Terri K., and Evan B., for your much appreciated support of the Grail!

Quote of the Day:

I find those instances when the data gives us some uneasiness, when the evidence doesn’t line up with what we expect, I feel these are the most exciting moments. Nature is telling you, ‘Your thinking on this is wrong.’ That’s what I’m here for, to learn something new.

opengraph.title: News Briefs 01-02-2021 - The Daily Grail
